scene_end_anchor: Kaelen reached the center of the starfall crater and claimed a pulsing violet star-shard. The shard reacted violently with the fractured pewter filament in his marrow, binding itself to his life force. As he secured the shard, shadow-forms began to converge on his position within the glass-choked impact site.
constraints: The physical pewter filament in Kaelen's radius bone
The metallic scent of magic and the frost-burn cost
next_action: Kaelen must defend himself against the approaching shadow-forms and begin his ascent out of the crater.

last_scene: Kaelen navigated the treacherous glass crown of the Silver Valley to reach the impact site.

Kaelen claimed the shard, enduring a blinding metaphysical surge that bound the object to his marrow-bound magic.

The shockwave caused the High Spire to tilt and shattered the star-glass pillars.
The Starwrought Oath in Kaelen's marrow buckled and fractured, losing its light.
Kaelen observed a shadow-shape emerging from the impact site before fleeing.
